awards.text: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 26 nominations.

fullplot: Death Row guards at a penitentiary, in the 1930's, have a moral dilemma with their job when they discover one of their prisoners, a convicted murderer, has a special gift.
plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
title: The Green Mile

tomatoes.consensus: Though The Green Mile is long, critics say it's an absorbing, emotionally powerful experience.
